DOC.brief_summary: The study is proposed to determine the effect of three types of gonadotropins that are currently used in protocols of controlled ovarian stimulation in women undergoing in vitro fertilization techniques on the kinetics of embryonic development.
DOC.brief_title: Type of Gonadotropin and Embryo Kinetics of Development
DOC.criteria: Women <38 years old Weight <60 kg Own oocytes Patients have to provide signed informed consent Oocyte donors Vitrified oocytes Severe male factor (<1 million spz/ml) Weight >60 kg
